Articles.Content:
Hey KSP community
I have an issue where my game constantly freezes when loading and it only seams to do so with propeller parts. It can be firespiter, SXT or any mod that has a propeller for some reason they seam to stop the game loading. Currently I am only interested in fixing SXT the first engine that hangs is Sxttinyprop but deleting it only means the next propeller hangs. Does anyone have a fix that works?
This is where you come in
When loading your ship or the game as a whole?
You are missing files, like the resource used by those engines. Make sure you have all needed files (like, say, Firespitter's resources file as well as its plugin).
Firesipitter core is installed as is resources config
Then you'd best see what the engine that failed requires. (Check the log for the exception, scroll up to find what the part was)

SXT eFan. So it's the electric engines. I believe I saw an issue with KSP not liking mass-less fuels from a few builds ago. That fix was to install the firespitter config. Which I have.  Well Got 1.1 to play with for now
